selected_quotes: Inhaling lavender essential oil may reduce anxiety related to going to the dentist.
Lavender #essentialoil was shown to reduce #anxiety in patients receiving dental treatments. Has lavender helped you?
Lavender Oil May Reduce Anxiety More: #anxiety #health #medicine

citation.abstract: The pure essence of plants (essential oils) provides both psychological and physiological benefits when used accurately and safely. Conventionally, Lavender oil is known for relaxing, carminative, and sedative effects. Hence, an attempt was made to know the effect of Lavender essential oil on dental patient anxiety.
citation.title: Dental patient anxiety: Possible deal with Lavender fragrance.
